self.name: auth.bindTempAuthKey
self.description: Binds a temporary authorization key temp_auth_key_id to the permanent authorization key perm_auth_key_id. Each permanent key may only be bound to one temporary key at a time, binding a new temporary key overwrites the previous one.
self.descriptionExcerpt: Binds a temporary authorization key temp_auth_key_id to the permanent authorization key perm_auth_key_id....

arguments.name: expiresAt
arguments.description: UNIX timestamp in seconds to invalidate temporary key, see auth.bindTempAuthKey

throws.description: The passed temporary key is already bound to another perm_auth_key_id
throws.name: TEMP_AUTH_KEY_ALREADY_BOUND

throws.description: The request was not performed with a temporary authorization key
throws.name: TEMP_AUTH_KEY_EMPTY
